mapper.sql: SELECT t.id id, t.account_id accountId, t.to_account_id toAccountId, t.order_no orderNo, t.order_type orderType, t.order_frorm_id orderFrormId, t.order_source orderSource, t.order_amount orderAmount, t.charge_amount chargeAmount, t.order_state orderState, t.ret_code retCode, t.ret_message retMessage, t.create_time createTime, t.last_modify_time lastModifyTime, t.thirdparty_type thirdPartyType, t.cust_id custId, t.lend_no lendNo, t.to_cust_id toCustId, t.to_lend_no toLendNo, t.loan_cust_id loanCustId, t.loan_no loanNo, t.new_order_type newOrderType, t.trade_type tradeType FROM t_gq_fund_order t
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM t_gq_fund_order t WHERE t.order_type = 9 AND t.order_state = 2 AND DATE_FORMAT(t.create_time, '%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), '%Y%m%d') AND t.account_id = #{accountId}
SELECT t.order_no orderNo, t.create_time createTime FROM t_gq_fund_order t WHERE t.account_id = #{accountId}
where t.order_type in(1,2,9,11,12) AND t.abnormal_state NOT IN ('98080001','98080002') ORDER BY t.create_time DESC
